text: @LindseyGrahamSC @seanhannity Thousands of Americans are dying, economy in a free fall, millions face eviction, unemployment is running out & you choose to run a political hit job hearing on #HunterBiden ?You’re an accomplice to murder & a disgrace to America @SenateGOP @HouseGOP @GOP #COVID19 #SouthCarolina

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
